description:
🥋 THE SHADOW’S EDGE – Official Trailer (2025) | Jackie Chan Action 🥋
Silence isn’t safe, and shadows bring the fight. The Shadow’s Edge is the fierce new martial arts thriller of 2025 — where Jackie Chan faces old enemies & hidden secrets beneath the surface.

Film Overview
Retired master of stealth, Li Shen, is pulled back into the underworld when his estranged son disappears during a secret mission. Following cryptic clues through Chinatown’s night markets and rooftop alleyways, Li must outsmart assassins, unravel conspiracies, and fight his own past.


A huge thank you to All of our Channel Members! 
Ya'll really do keep the lights on for us over here.

THE SHADOW'S EDGE Official Trailer (2025) Jackie Chan Movies 4K
